data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yalin, Lu, Lin (2011): Taxonomy of the vector leafhopper genus Nesoclutha Evans (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) in China, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 2763: 61-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276835
